import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import logo from '../../assets/images/how-it-work-thumb.png' import StickyMenu from '../../lib/StickyMenu' import Navigation from '../Navigation' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function DashboardHeader({ action }) { const refreshToken = localStorage.getItem('refreshToken') useEffect(() => { StickyMenu() }) const logOut = async () => { await axios.get('/api/logout/', { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Authorization: `Bearer ${refreshToken}`, }, }) } return ( <>
Login LogOut
action(e)} className="toggle-btn ml-30 canvas_open d-lg-none d-block" >
) } export default DashboardHeader
